獙字的基本解释

獙
bì
〔獙獙〕古代传说中的一种怪兽，形状似狐狸而有翅膀，声音似大雁。

獙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《集韻》毗祭切，去祭，並。］
见“獙獙”。

獙字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页718第10
【集韻】毗祭切，音敝。【山海經】姑逢之山有獸焉，狀如狐而有翼，音如鴻鴈，名曰獙獙。【註】獙獙，狐屬也。

獙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獙字的起名意思

暂无。

die violently
Basic explanation of words
die violently
bì
〔獙獙〕A monster in ancient legends, shaped like a fox, with wings, and a voice like a wild goose.
die violently
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Ji Yun" admire the cut, go to the sacrifice, and. ]
See "獙獙".
die violently
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獙; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 718 No. 10
[Jiyun] Admire the sacrifice cut, the sound ditto. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of Gufeng has beasts, resembling a fox with wings, and its sound is like a wild goose, and its name is 獙獙. [Note] The 獙獙 is also the genus fox.
die violently
